question:
You recently saw an advertisement in a newspaper seeking volunteers to do unpaid work with local children. You are interested in this work. Write a letter to the head of the organisation. In your letter
 express your interest
ask for details of the work that needs to be done
let them know when you are available.
text: I am Katherine, a resident of the city Chandigarh and working in a renowned Non-Profit making organization named Ashakiran. My purpose of writing today is with regards to the recent advertisement to hire individuals for non-profit work for needy children. It was published in the famous local newspaper The Tribune on 6th July.

Firstly, I would like to inform you that as working in the same professional area, I found the offer quite suitable for me. As I am planning to expand my work areas so that I can serve a large number of people and help the nation in building a democratic and wealthy society.

Furthermore, kindly help me know the tasks that are to be performed for the given job profile. Since it is a customer service area, this little effort helps me to understand the requirements of the post. Consequently, it will assist in serving the youngsters effectively. Moreover, also inform the duties and other mandatory requirements  for the post, so that I can plan accordingly.
Although my work timings are 9AM  to 5PM in the evening, I can work for this post anytime during the day, because my existing profile can be operated from home or at any place.
Hoping to hear a positive reply from your side.
